view.label: Azure Virtual Machines
view.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_azure_overview":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":2,"fields":{"CPUUtilization":{"unit":"%","unitPosition":"after"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_azure_overview"},"title":"Virtual Machines","description":""},"viz_active_vm":{"type":"viz.singlevalue","options":{},"encoding":{"trend":"primary[1]","majorColor":{"field":"primary[1]","format":{"type":"rangevalue","ranges":[{"from":100,"value":"#cb3b43"},{"from":70,"to":100,"value":"#ff7152"},{"from":50,"to":70,"value":"#fc9850"},{"from":30,"to":50,"value":"#f4df7a"},{"from":10,"value":"#53a051","to":30},{"to":10,"value":"#5fbcff"}]}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_active_vm"},"title":"Active Virtual Machines"},"viz_top_vm_cpu":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_vm_cpu"},"title":"Top Virtual Machines by CPU %"},"viz_active_hosts_az":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_active_hosts_az"},"title":"Active Hosts by Region"},"viz_disk_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_24h_change"},"title":"Disk Metrics 24h Change %","description":""},"viz_network_bytes_in":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_bytes_in"},"title":"Network Bytes In"},"viz_network_bytes_out":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_bytes_out"},"title":"Network Bytes Out"},"viz_disk_IO_trend":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"encoding":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_IO_trend"},"title":"Disk I/O Trend"},"viz_top_network_in":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_network_in"},"title":"Top Network Bytes In/Min"},"viz_top_network_out":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_network_out"},"title":"Top Network Bytes Out/Min"},"viz_disk_IOPS_trend":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"encoding":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_IOPS_trend"},"title":"Disk IOPs Trend"},"viz_network_in_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_in_24h_change"},"title":"Network In Metrics 24h Change %"},"viz_network_out_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_out_24h_change"},"title":"Network Out Metrics 24h Change %"},"viz_cpu_perc_trend":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_cpu_perc_trend"},"title":"CPU Percentile Distribution"},"viz_aZjCRsWp":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"strokeWidth":0}},"viz_fqbe8qML":{"type":"viz.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ScyU4xDe_ds_active_hosts_az"},"title":"Active Hosts by Group Name"}},"dataSources":{"ds_vm_input":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_id | join type=left azure_resource_id [| msearch index="sim_metrics" | search sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" | table azure_resource_id, azure_resource_name] | eval instance= if(isnull(azure_resource_name), "ID: ".azure_resource_id, "ID: ".azure_resource_id." - Resource Name: ".azure_resource_name), azure_resource_id="\"".azure_resource_id."\"" | sort azure_resource_id | table instance, azure_resource_id","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Virtual Machines"},"ds_region_input":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) BY azure_region","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Region"},"ds_group_input":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_group_name ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Resource Group"},"ds_azure_overview":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_id span=$span_tok$
| eval value =round(value,1)
| stats latest(value) as value by azure_resource_id 
| join type=left azure_resource_id [| msearch index="sim_metrics" |search sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" | table azure_resource_id,azure_resource_name,azure_resource_group_name,azure_region]
| rename azure_resource_id as "Instance ID" ,azure_resource_name as "Instance Name" ,azure_resource_group_name as "Group Name" ,azure_region as "Region", value as "CPUUtilization"
| sort "Instance Name"
| table "Instance Name", "CPUUtilization", "Instance ID" ,"Group Name" , "Region"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"overview"},"ds_active_vm":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_id span=$span_tok$
| chart count(azure_resource_id) over _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"active_virtual_machines"},"ds_top_vm_cpu":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_id azure_resource_name span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(value)) as "Sparkline" latest(value) as "CPU %" by azure_resource_name
| eval "CPU %" = round('CPU %',1)
| sort -"CPU %"
| rename azure_resource_name as "Resource Name"
| table "CPU %", "Sparkline" "Resource Name"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Virtual Machines by CPU %"},"ds_active_hosts_az":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_id, azure_region 
| chart dc(azure_resource_id) as Count by azure_region
| sort -Count
| rename azure_region as Region
| table Count Region","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Active Virtual Machines by Region"},"ds_cpu_perc":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"CPU % Trend"},"ds_disk_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="Disk Read Operations/Sec" OR metric_name="Disk Write Operations/Sec" OR metric_name="Disk Write Bytes" OR metric_name="Disk Read Bytes") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h by metric_name 
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols 
 [ mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="Disk Read Operations/Sec" OR metric_name="Disk Write Operations/Sec" OR metric_name="Disk Write Bytes" OR metric_name="Disk Read Bytes") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h by metric_name 
 | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h
 | eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")]
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2)
| fields - old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk I/O"},"ds_network_bytes_in":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network In" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Bytes In"},"ds_network_bytes_out":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network Out" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Bytes Out"},"ds_disk_IO_trend":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="Disk Read Bytes" OR metric_name="Disk Write Bytes") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) by metric_name span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(value) span=$span_tok$ by metric_name
| rename "Disk Read Bytes" as bytes_written, "Disk Write Bytes" as bytes_read
| eval bytes_written=round(bytes_written,2), bytes_read=round(bytes_read,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk I/O Trend"},"ds_top_network_in":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network In" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) by azure_resource_id span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by azure_resource_id
| eval avg= round(avg,2)
| sort -avg
| rename azure_resource_id as "Resource ID", avg as "Bytes In/Min"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Network Bytes In/Min"},"ds_top_network_out":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network Out" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) by azure_resource_id span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by azure_resource_id
| eval avg= round(avg,2)
| sort -avg
| rename azure_resource_id as "Resource ID", avg as "Bytes Out/Min"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Network Bytes Out/Min"},"ds_disk_IOPS_trend":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as "value" WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="Disk Read Operations/Sec" OR metric_name="Disk Write Operations/Sec") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) by metric_name span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(value) span=$span_tok$ by metric_name
| rename "Disk Read Operations/Sec" as write_ops, "Disk Write Operations/Sec" as read_ops
| eval write_ops=round(write_ops,2), read_ops=round(read_ops,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk IOPs Trend"},"ds_network_in_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network In" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols [mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network In" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h 
| eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")]
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/Old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2)
| fields - Old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network In Metrics 24h Change %"},"ds_network_out_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network Out" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols [mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Network Out" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h 
| eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")]
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/Old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2)
| fields - Old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Out Metrics 24h Change %"},"ds_cpu_perc_trend":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"CPU Percentile Distribution"},"ds_ScyU4xDe_ds_active_hosts_az":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Percentage CPU" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:Azure Virtual Machines" AND (azure_resource_id IN($azure_resource_id_tok$)) AND (azure_resource_group_name IN($azure_resource_group_tok$)) AND (azure_region IN($azure_resource_region_tok$)) BY azure_resource_group_name, azure_resource_id
| chart dc(azure_resource_id) as Count by azure_resource_group_name
| sort -Count
| rename azure_resource_group_name as "Group Name"
| table Count "Group Name"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Active Virtual Machines by Group Name"}},"inputs":{"input_azure_instance":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Virtual Machines","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"azure_resource_id_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[1]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_vm_input"}},"input_azure_resource_groups":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Resource Groups","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"azure_resource_group_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_group_input"}},"input_azure_region":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Regions","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"azure_resource_region_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_region_input"}},"input_time":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-24h@h,now","token":"tr"},"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Picker"},"input_resolution":{"options":{"defaultValue":"5m","token":"span_tok"},"type":"input.text","title":"Resolution"},"input_split_series":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Split Series","options":{"items":[{"label":"True","value":"true"},{"label":"False","value":"false"}],"token":"split_series_tok","defaultValue":"true"}}},"layout":{"globalInputs":["input_azure_instance","input_azure_resource_groups","input_azure_region","input_time","input_resolution","input_split_series"],"type":"absolute","options":{"width":1400,"height":1700,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_aZjCRsWp","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1400,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_azure_overview","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":1380,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_active_vm","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":320,"w":330,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_vm_cpu","type":"block","position":{"x":740,"y":590,"w":650,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_active_hosts_az","type":"block","position":{"x":870,"y":320,"w":517,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":860,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_bytes_in","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":1130,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_bytes_out","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":1400,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_IO_trend","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":860,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_network_in","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":1130,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_network_out","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":1400,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_IOPS_trend","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":860,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_in_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":1130,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_out_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":1400,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_cpu_perc_trend","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":590,"w":720,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_fqbe8qML","type":"block","position":{"x":350,"y":320,"w":510,"h":260}}]},"description":"","title":"Azure Virtual Machines"}
